questions.question: When was this document last reviewed?
questions.description: Date of the most recent review before this version

questions.question: Who is the document owner responsible for maintaining these guidelines?
questions.description: Team or individual responsible for document maintenance

questions.question: What is your brand name?
questions.description: The official brand name that will replace placeholder text throughout the document

questions.question: What is the version number for this brand guidelines document?
questions.description: Version number for tracking document revisions

questions.question: When do these brand guidelines go into effect?
questions.description: The date when these guidelines become active

questions.question: Who approved these brand guidelines?
questions.description: Name or title of the person who approved this document

questions.question: What is your brand mission statement?
questions.description: The core purpose and reason for your brand's existence
questions.placeholder: To empower businesses through innovative technology solutions that drive growth and efficiency.

questions.question: What is your brand vision statement?
questions.description: Your aspirational view of what the brand aims to achieve in the future
questions.placeholder: To be the world's most trusted technology partner, transforming how businesses operate and succeed.

questions.question: What are your core brand values?
questions.description: List 4-6 core values that guide your brand's behavior and decisions

questions.question: How is your brand positioned in the market?
questions.description: Describe your target audience, market position, and key differentiators
questions.placeholder: We serve mid-market B2B companies seeking reliable, scalable technology solutions, differentiating through exceptional customer service and proven ROI.

questions.question: What communication contexts does your brand use and what tone should each have?
questions.description: Define how your brand should sound in different contexts (e.g., Marketing, Product, Sales, Support)

questions.question: What are your primary brand colors?
questions.description: List your primary brand colors with technical specifications and usage guidance

questions.question: What are your secondary brand colors?
questions.description: List your secondary/supporting colors with technical specifications and usage guidance

questions.question: What fonts should be used for primary typography?
questions.description: Specify the fonts to use for headings and body text

questions.question: What fallback fonts should be used when primary fonts aren't available?
questions.description: Specify fallback fonts for web and system environments

questions.question: Which specific departments or areas within your company do these guidelines apply to?
questions.description: List all departments that must follow these brand guidelines
questions.placeholder: Marketing, Product Development, Sales, Customer Success, HR, Finance

questions.question: What items are specifically out of scope for these brand guidelines?
questions.description: Specify what is not covered by these guidelines
questions.placeholder: Experimental campaign branding, partner co-branded materials, internal training documents

questions.question: How often should these brand guidelines be reviewed?
questions.description: Set the review frequency for keeping guidelines current

questions.question: Which team is responsible for reviewing and updating these guidelines?
questions.description: Identify the team responsible for maintaining the guidelines
